array.string: The Koolo app is designed and developed as part of the KULU project, a research and design project based at the Department of Informatics at the University of Oslo. KULU stands for Cool technology for youth with long-term health challenges.
We developed the KOOLO app for research purposes and we hope to add some new functionality in the future.
You are free to use it, but please donâ€™t expect any support or maintenance from us, except when you participate in our research project.

You are also free to build upon it (adapting it or adding functionality) as long the app remains a non-commercial product, you credit the contributors, and you license the new creation under identical license terms.
